scripts.test:moderator: node bin/ai.js moderate -P -C -A -m 'this is a fucking shit message, email: test@mail.net phone: 123456789 IP: 127.1.2.3 address: 1, Some adrress, Redmond, WA 98052'
scripts.test:analysis:sentiment:happy: node bin/ai.js analysis -s -l 'pt' -m 'Olá mundo! Estou contente por funcionar.'
scripts.test:analysis:sentiment:sad: node bin/ai.js analysis -s -l 'pt' -m 'Olá mundo... não me importo por isso funcionar.'
scripts.test:analysis:sentiment:angry: node bin/ai.js analysis -s -l 'pt' -m 'OLÁ MUNDO! Tá osso!'
